page.title: 12PEN-Y-WERN FARM GOYTRE
page.content: My farm covers{110 acres }and is mainly grassland.We grow no crops so we have to make our living entirely out of{livestock.}On the farm we keep pigs,cows,horses,geese,cats and dogs.We make our living from the pigs,cows and geese and keep the other animals just for fun.We have to feed all the animals and clean out the pig stys regulary.In the winter we have to feed the cattle with hay.I help with the feeding and also help to weigh the pigs on the scales to see if they are ready for market. I travel to school by{mini-bus}which picks me up in the farmyard.My sister and I enjoy travelling to school with our friends. In the evenings I sometimes ride on my bike to the village green or play on the farm.I enjoy climbing up on to the farmsheds and looking around the farm. {Written by Chris Price aged 10 years.}
